oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Antimicrobial stewardship in small ruminant practice
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Fajt, Virginia
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: antimicrobial stewardship
antibiotic use
antibiotic resistance
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Protecting the resource of antimicrobial susceptibility and efÂ­fectiveness of antimicrobial drugs is the goal of antimicrobial stewardship (AMS). Examples of ways to implement AMS into small ruminant practice are provided herein.
